item.title: Ubuntu18
item.description: Ubuntu 18.04 安装nodejs 12 参考连接： https://linuxize.com/post/how-to-install-node-js-on-ubuntu-18.04/ curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_12.x | sudo -E bash - sudo apt update sudo apt install nodejs node --version npm --version
